original_text: And the waters returned, and covered the chariots, and the horsemen, and all the host of Pharaoh that came into the sea after them; there remained not so much as one of them.
korean_text: 물이 다시 흘러 병거들과 기병들을 덮되 그들의 뒤를 따라 바다에 들어간 바로의 군대를 다 덮으니 하나도 남지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: and all the host of Pharaoh
that came into the sea after them
there remained not so much as one of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 단 한 사람도 남지 않았다
